description:
Job Title:
*PythonDeveloper Needed for Zerodha Kite Algo Trading Bot*

---

Job Description:

I am looking for an experienced *Pythondeveloper* to build a simple *algorithmic trading bot* using the *Zerodha Kite API*.

*Strategy Logic:*

1. At 9:30 AM, fetch the 5-minute candle open price of *NIFTY 50 index*.
2. Based on this price, round to the nearest 50 to select *ATM strike*.
3. Use that strike to fetch data for both *NIFTY ATM CE & PE options* (e.g., NIFTY25850CE and NIFTY25850PE).
4. Plot a horizontal line on both CE and PE charts at the 9:30 open price.
5. Apply *VWAP indicator* on both charts.
6. If a candle's open & close do not touch VWAP and the horizontal line, trigger a *buy entry at High + 1*.

title: WebRTC SaaS Audio Ingestion Fix
description:
About the Project
We are building a WebRTC SaaS platform with real-time Speech-to-Text (STT) powered by Vosk/Whisper.

Our architecture includes:
WebRTC audio/video via Mediasoup
Node/NestJS signaling & media server logicPython-based STT workers (Vosk + Whisper)
FFmpeg bridges for RTP → PCM chunking
PlainTransport (comedia) for external RTP ingest
Transcription per 1-second PCM chunks
 
The system is in advanced stage, but the audio capture pipeline (WebRTC → Mediasoup → RTP → FFmpeg → PCM → STT) is not producing consistent audio data. FFmpeg shows timeouts or empty output, meaning RTP is not received or decoded properly.
 
We need an expert who can diagnose and fully fix the audio ingestion pipeline end-to-end.
